title: De Soto National Memorial: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger               Be A Junior Ranger        De Soto National Memorials "New" Junior Ranger Activity Book! Cover Art by Hermann Trapman   Â   The New Junior Ranger Activity Book is Here! Visitors can obtain the Junior Ranger activity booklet from the Visitor Center between 9-5 daily. To earn a free Junior Ranger Badge, kids have to complete six activites as well as a park map activity. Kids get a free book with a pencil and compass to help them complete the activities. We also have "official" Junior Ranger hats available in our bookstore.Download the entire Junior Ranger Book in PDF format by clicking here!
